attributes.action: No discrimination of any kind due to Corona non vaccination of one's own choice
attributes.additional_details: The government are fixating on prevention or reduction of a health concern that thousands, of objective doctors, scientists and lawyers worldwide are questioning the validity and wisdom of. I ask the government to remember there are many aspects of living a fundamental human existence apart from being drawn down a path of fear, manifestations and damage thereof, which the government, with ever-changing seemingly unreliable and objectively unverified figures, are pushing, as our only option.
attributes.background: Protection of pre March 2020 Covid-19 fundamental human freedoms of living such as breathing properly, working, travelling, worshipping and human interaction.
